partners.title: Trusted by

partners.description: Cross-functional squads from compliance, CX and growth use WhatsApp Bot Builder as the foundation of their automation stack.

caseStudies.title: How teams ship measurable results
caseStudies.subtitle: Every project pairs a compliant WhatsApp experience with reliable payments, analytics and success measurement.

healthcare.title: Automated triage across 7 clinics
healthcare.description: Patient requests are pre-qualified, routed to the right medical teams and documented in the EMR without manual copy & paste.
healthcare.result: Integration covers DPA-compliant storage, handover to staff and role-based approvals in under two weeks.

retail.title: Conversational checkout for a fashion brand
retail.description: Product advice, payments and shipping updates run inside WhatsApp, while Stripe and PayPal track every transaction.
retail.result: Playbooks bundle product feed sync, multi-lingual copy and analytics dashboards for marketing teams.

agency.title: White-label automation offering
agency.description: A digital agency onboards 18 client bots in six weeks, including branding, invoicing and customer success dashboards.
agency.result: Reusable n8n workflows, Supabase schemas and payment handoffs enable scalable delivery.

resources.title: Downloadable assets to fast-track delivery
resources.subtitle: Each artifact is updated quarterly with new templates, compliance checklists and automation tips from real projects.

items.title: Automation recipes for n8n & Supabase

highlights: Supabase SQL snippets for quota tracking

items.title: Multilingual messaging library
items.description: Approved templates for onboarding, support and payments in German, English and French.

resources.assuranceHeadline: Every resource is validated with real deployments

healthcare.headline: Automated patient triage for a hospital group
healthcare.description: The bot handles repetitive questions, pre-qualifies appointment requests and frees up hotline teams.
healthcare.result: Go-live in 14 days including DPA, role-based access control and audit logging.

retail.description: WhatsApp guides shoppers through product advice, payment selection and delivery status around the clock.

retail.result: Stripe, PayPal, Apple Pay and Klarna are orchestrated end to end without manual handover.

security.title: Security and compliance by design
security.subtitle: EU-hosted infrastructure with independent audits and transparent documentation.
features: PCI DSS Level 1 payment processing through Stripe and PayPal
End-to-end TLS encryption plus optional isolated storage at rest
Tamper-proof audit logs, role approvals and activity monitoring
assurance: Hosting in Frankfurt (eu-central-1) with daily geo-redundant backups
Ready-to-sign Data Processing Agreement and TOM documentation
Quarterly penetration tests and continuous automated security scans

header.title: Transparent pricing
header.subtitle: Pick the plan that fits your team. Every tier stays GDPR compliant and EU hosted.

rag.chatDescription: AI በተጨመሩት የእውቀት ምንጮች ላይ ብቻ ይመልሳል.
rag.emptyChat: በየእውቀት ምንጮችዎ ላይ የተመሰረተ ጥያቄ ይጠይቁ.
rag.emptyChatHint: AI ከተጨመሩት ምንጮች እውነታዎችን ብቻ ሊያገለግል ይችላል.

emailVerificationFailed.title: የኢሜይል ማረጋገጫ አልተሳካም
emailVerificationFailed.description: የማረጋገጫ አገናኝ ትክክል አይደለም ወይም ጊዜው አልፏል። ይህ የሚከሰተው:
emailVerificationFailed.reason1: አገናኙ ቀድሞውኑ አንድ ጊዜ ጥቅም ላይ ውሏል
emailVerificationFailed.reason2: አገናኙ ለብዙ ጊዜ ተጠብቋል (ከ24 ሰዓታት በላይ)
emailVerificationFailed.reason3: አገናኙ ወደ ትክክለኛው ወይ ስፍራ አይመራም
emailVerificationFailed.resendPrompt: አዲስ የማረጋገጫ ኢሜይል በ {email} ማግኘት ይፈልጋሉ?
emailVerificationFailed.enterEmail: አዲስ የማረጋገጫ ኢሜይል ለመቀበል የኢሜይል አድራሻዎን ያስገቡ:
emailVerificationFailed.resendSuccessMessage: እባክዎ ለአዲሱ የማረጋገጫ አገናኝ ኢ-መለያዎን ይፈትሹ።
emailVerificationFailed.supabaseConfigMessage: አገናኙ ወደ localhost:3000 ከመራ በ Supabase Dashboard ላይ ያለው የጣቢያ URL ወደ https://whatsapp.owona.de መለወጥ አለበት።

statusOverview.heading: ቀጣይ እርምጃዎች
statusOverview.personal: መልሶቻችንን ለእርስዎ ብቻ እንሰጣለን እና ከቲኬቱ የአሁኑ ሁኔታ ጋር እንያያልን።
statusOverview.escalation: የመጀመሪያውን መልስ ከላኩ በኋላ ቲኬቱን በራስ-ሰር ወደ Tier 2 እናስቀምጣለን።

silentCheck.uiTraceCaptured: የUI ትክክለኛ ተከታታይ ተያይዟል። ቡድናችን ዝርዝሮቹን ይመረምራል።

inbox.autoEscalated: መልስዎ ተቀምጧል – ቲኬቱ በራስ-ሰር ወደ Tier 2 ተልኳል።
